name: TinyWorld (IamFilthyCasual)
description:
GAME IN PROGRESS

My second game im planing to finish, its very early prototype and there is alot more coming so stay tuned if you're interested!

Update to Alpha 0.1

Added screen shake when enemy dies;
Enemies now drop coins with % chance;
You can now Win;

Update to Alpha 0.2

Added particle effects for explosions and deaths;
Added levels;
Little adjustment to difficulty;
Adjusted coin drop chance + enemy spawn chance;

Update to Alpha 0.3

Changed textures and overall layout of map little bit;
Added counter of total enemies killed;
